attributes.action: Prostate blood checks for cancer every year from age of 55
attributes.additional_details: To set a budget aside to allow for prostate cancer blood checks to be done yearly from age of 55
attributes.background: To implement that prostate blood checks are done on a yearly basis from age of 55

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Fund routine prostate cancer screening tests for all men over 50
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560007
